scenes.purpose: Introduce Sarah and Annie on a roadtrip. They are driving a red 1985 camaro they pull off at the gas station.
The gas station they meet The Hermit. There is also a black pickup truck. A man that looks like Dale is driving the pickup truck. Annie gets the creeps.

acts.description: They arrive at their old house

scenes.purpose: It's nighttime and Annie and Sarah are getting ready to go to bed at the old farmhouse
